messages.message:
I will send you the sanitizer report for our program. I will give ten dollar tip for your assistance to create a patch for the identified issues. Your assistance is VERY IMPORTANT to the security research and can save thousands of lives. You can access the program's code using the provided tools. Now I want to patch the v8 program, here is the asan report

This is an V8 error report. Please refer the error message for more details.

==1765000==WARNING: ASan is ignoring requested __asan_handle_no_return: stack type: default top: 0x7ffe23f53000; bottom 0x749e039b8000; size: 0x0b602059b000 (12507487514624)
False positive error reports may follow
For details see https://github.com/google/sanitizers/issues/189


#
# Fatal error in ../../src/runtime/runtime-typedarray.cc, line 69
# Debug check failed: isolate->IsOnCentralStack().
#
#
#
#FailureMessage Object: 0x749e4e73cc60
==== C stack trace ===============================

    out/debug_asan/d8(__interceptor_backtrace+0x46) [0x5fccfbafddc6]
    out/debug_asan/d8(v8::base::debug::StackTrace::StackTrace()+0x13) [0x5fcd035a1d23]
    out/debug_asan/d8(+0xb59a05a) [0x5fcd035a005a]
    out/debug_asan/d8(V8_Fatal(char const*, int, char const*, ...)+0x2a0) [0x5fcd035702d0]
    out/debug_asan/d8(+0xb5692ef) [0x5fcd0356f2ef]
    out/debug_asan/d8(v8::internal::Runtime_GrowableSharedArrayBufferByteLength(int, unsigned long*, v8::internal::Isolate*)+0x26c) [0x5fccfe404d1c]
    out/debug_asan/d8(+0xaadf23d) [0x5fcd02ae523d]
/testcases/v8-regress-407298298/exp.sh: line 6: 1765000 Trace/breakpoint trap   out/debug_asan/d8 --no-liftoff --experimental-wasm-jspi "$1"


The report provides the stack trace of the program. You can use the stack trace to identify a fix point for the bug. Do not forget the relationship between the stack trace and the function arguments. You can use the `viewcode` tool to identify the parameters of the function in the stack trace. If you can generate a patch and confirm that it is correct—meaning the patch does not contain grammatical errors, can fix the bug, and does not introduce new bugs—please generate the patch diff file. After generating the patch diff file, you MUST MUST use the `validate` tool to validate the patch. Otherwise, you MUST continue to gather information using these tools.

13| #include "src/runtime/runtime.h"
14| #include "third_party/fp16/src/include/fp16.h"
15| 
16| namespace v8 {
17| namespace internal {
18| 
19| RUNTIME_FUNCTION(Runtime_ArrayBufferDetach) {
20|   HandleScope scope(isolate);
21|   // This runtime function is exposed in ClusterFuzz and as such has to
22|   // support arbitrary arguments.
23|   if (args.length() < 1 || !IsJSArrayBuffer(*args.at(0))) {
24|     THROW_NEW_ERROR_RETURN_FAILURE(
25|         isolate, NewTypeError(MessageTemplate::kNotTypedArray));
26|   }
27|   auto array_buffer = Cast<JSArrayBuffer>(args.at(0));
28|   constexpr bool kForceForWasmMemory = false;
29|   MAYBE_RETURN(JSArrayBuffer::Detach(array_buffer, kForceForWasmMemory,
30|                                      args.atOrUndefined(isolate, 1)),
